title: ClosetMaid 78060 Sliding Tie & Belt Rack for Wire Shelving, Satin Chrome, 7x4.5x15.5 inch
features: Measures 7-inches heigh by 4.5-inches wide by 15.5-inches deep
description: ClosetMaid has a full line of accessories for both inside and outside the closet. These accessories create storage solutions for many places in your home. Use this ClosetMaid 24-hook sliding Tie & Belt rack for storing and organizing your ties, belts, scarves and jewelry. The rack attaches to ClosetMaid wire shelving and pulls out easy for visibility of items.

title: Doesn’t slide like butter, but it’s so compact!
